name: Lost Memories (MissSteakStudios)
description:
A short, at times bittersweet game about a photo album that has lost its owner and has to remember, through the pictures that holds, key pieces of information to get back to him.

Developed for the Global Game Jam 2021

Credits: 
Matías Mellado: Programming
Andy Peláez: Art
Morgan Recabarren: Narrative

Global Game Jam page: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/na-2
